page.title: 09Field Names, Wombourne
page.content:
These are the names used by farmers for fields in the Wombourne area. Now many fields have houses on them.
1:Mops Pit 2:Chinners Piece 3:Davies Piece 4:Davies Bank 5:Bottom 15 6:The Valley Piece 7: 8 Acre 8:Doe Bank 9:Big Spencer 10:Barn Piece 11:The Pool Piece 12:The 4 Acre 13:The Chapel Meadow 14:The Brick Bridge Piece 15:The Triangular Piece 16:The Slang 17:The Crane 18:Hungry Graze 19:Middle Stiles 20:Abbiss Patch 21:The Railway Piece 22:The Mount Piece 23:Mini Farm 24:The Wilderness 25:The Tennis Court 26:The Bath Lands 27:The Brook Piece 28:The Longlands 29:The Closs 30:Mill (House)(Farm) 31:The Walk House 32:Mill Lane Farm (Farm House Still There) 33:The Grass 34:The Bottom Meadow 35:Black Acre
